text: Nordic Bouldering and Lead Climbing Championships are an annual set of two climbing competitions. Both competitions include junior and senior categories in the same event. == Rules == Nordic Bouldering and Lead Climbing Championships for seniors follow either IFSC or EYC rules depending on the organizers choice with only a qualification and final round. Nordic Bouldering and Lead Climbing Championships for juniors follow the EYC rules. == Nordic Bouldering medalists == === Senior medalists === {| class="wikitable" ! rowspan="2" |Year ! rowspan="2" |Location !
